name: Metal Factory Tycoon
description:
As you probably guessed from the title this game is a tycoon game.
The controls are:
Mouse - To drag and delete (Left drag an object. Right delete an object).
Spacebar - Making Money (You are starting with 0, Meaning that you can't buy anything).

Tutorial:
Start from clicking on the spacebar for making money and upgrade the spacebar by clicking on the upgrade button

Click on the building button and drag any machine and put it anywhere you want. (The Cost of the machine is higher by the kind of metal that it makes).
Image Number 1 shows the process

Then buy a conveyor belt and put it under the machine. (Image Number 2).

Final thing you will have to do, Is to buy a selling point and put it to the right side of the conveyor belt. (Image Number 3).

Then click again on the building to toggle off. And now wait Until a Metal box creates.
Follow the tasks to complete the game.
